resources.string: Professional chefs can now enjoy the benefits of reliable equipment built with reputed European refrigeration system & controllers, high quality stainless steel and energy saving design with our products that include Refrigerated Reach-In Cabinets, Undercounters, Preparation Counters, Chef Tables, Saladettes, Countertop Displays, Blast Freezers & Chillers and a complete range of Ice Cube Making Machines. Team Trufrost also has a proven expertise in design, supply and installation of walk in coolers and freezers for commercial kitchens. Our Butler range of cooking products, coffee machines and blenders , food preparation and bakery products complement the Trufrost range of cooling products to comprehensively address the foodservice equipment needs of commercial kitchens and coffee shops.
